# ControlMedia
**SUBCATEGORY:** Controls

<hr />

## Media (play)
### Description
For playing media. Useful where the control may overlap other objects.

<Playground>
  <ControlMedia />
</Playground>

**Disabled**
<Playground>
  <ControlMedia disabled />
</Playground>

<hr />
